metadata.description: Required. Specifies the Virtual Network Gateway name.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Specifies the name of the Public IP used by the Virtual Network Gateway. If it's not provided, a '-pip' suffix will be appended to the gateway's name.
Optional. Resource Id of the Public IP Prefix object. This is only needed if you want your Public IPs created in a PIP Prefix.

Optional. DNS name(s) of the Public IP resource(s). If you enabled active-active configuration, you need to provide 2 DNS names, if you want to use this feature. A region specific suffix will be appended to it, e.g.: your-DNS-name.westeurope.cloudapp.azure.com
Required. Specifies the gateway type. E.g. VPN, ExpressRoute
Required. The Sku of the Gateway.
Required. Specifies the VPN type
Optional. Specifies the VPN GW generation.
Required. Virtual Network resource Id
Optional. Value to specify if the Gateway should be deployed in active-active or active-passive configuration
Optional. Value to specify if BGP is enabled or not
Optional. ASN value
Optional. The IP address range from which VPN clients will receive an IP address when connected. Range specified must not overlap with on-premise network.
Optional. Client root certificate data used to authenticate VPN clients.
Optional. Thumbprint of the revoked certificate. This would revoke VPN client certificates matching this thumbprint from connecting to the VNet.
Optional. Specifies the number of days that logs will be kept for; a value of 0 will retain data indefinitely.
Required. Resource identifier of the Diagnostic Storage Account.
Required. Resource identifier of Log Analytics.
Optional. Resource ID of the event hub authorization rule for the Event Hubs namespace in which the event hub should be created or streamed to.
Optional. Name of the event hub within the namespace to which logs are streamed. Without this, an event hub is created for each log category.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'
Optional. Switch to lock Virtual Network Gateway from deletion.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. Customer Usage Attribution id (GUID). This GUID must be previously registered

resources.name: Microsoft.Authorization/virtualNetworkGatewayDoNotDelete
resources.comments: Resource lock on Virtual Network Gateway

metadata.description: The Resource Group the Virtual Network Gateway was deployed.
The Name of the Virtual Network Gateway.
The Resource Id of the Virtual Network Gateway.
Shows if the VNet gateway is configured in active-active mode.
